Only 1% said that EUV will never be embraced, down from 6% last year and a whopping 35% in 2014. âThereâs no question in my mind,â EUV will be adopted starting with 7-nm+ processes in the next few years, said Aki Fujimura, an industry veteran and spokesman for the eBeam Initiative, a trade group that conducted the survey over the summer.
